column5: Just a heads up the Perch are now starting at the mouth of the Grand river and load of Silver Bass at the Dunnville Dam
i dont think theres a season for them
what i meant was its open all year
Yes Silver Bass and Perch are Open all year ...
whats the most effective way to catch them at dunnville steve? white twister tails or live minnows?
Yes Twisters for sure Yum white or Limecore ...if you use minnows set up with a slip float small split shot and a nice shinner you good to go about 3 ft down ....

I dunno, 3 of my friend's headed out to dunnville this morning after hearing this report. Not a singleperch was had among them or anyone close to them at Maitland. And the same went for silvers i dunno if they are in or maybe the bite just wasn't on.
